# N: 50

Sigma: 0.125

```{r fig.height=6, fig.width=8, cache = TRUE}
mod <- poly_model(2, x = rand_uniform(-1, 1), sigma = 0.125)
ori_dat <- mod$gen(50)
i <- 0
plot_list <- list()

for (a in c(2, 3, 4, 5, 6)) {

  i <- i + 1
  mod$set_prm("a", a) %>%
    {.$gen(50, computed = select(ori_dat, x, e))} %>%
    {mod$plot(., remove_axis = TRUE, remove_grid_line = TRUE, theme = theme_light())} +
    ggtitle(glue::glue("a:{a}")) -> plot_list[[i]]

} 

patchwork::wrap_plots(plot_list)
```
